description: Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) For: Testing and evaluation of tire safety for passenger and light trucks vehicles, winter tires and heavy-duty tires. Testing will be done in North America. Testing procedures will include, but are not limited to, rolling resistance, wet traction, snow traction, dynamic mechanical analysis, thermal gravimetric analysis, tires composition and ice traction tests on a selective basis as indicated in the contract. Travel will be required for testing with 5 days notice. Business must provide a qualified lab technician, lab staff and computer systems to complete the contract. Business must be able to complete work under ISO standards procedures. Aft risk of testing. The entry of doing the contract will see value in this contract (300k). The notice published on November 1, 2022  will expire on November 16, 2022. The firms must be to send a statement of Intent prior to Nov 15, 2022. 85017Z-g18_is_ca.pdf
duration_in_months: EThe contract has a duration of approximately 3 years, with an estimated renewal period of 2 years.
